title: Instead of Being Transported to Another World Directly, I Was Given the Abilities of the Strongest Character in the Anime World - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Romance
tags: Dense Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   God-human Relationship   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Male Protagonist   Master-Disciple Relationship   Nobles   Overpowered Protagonist   R-15   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Transported to Another World   Weak to Strong   Wishes
author: Crosis
description:
On his way to work, he is suddenly transported to a strange space and is told by a person who claims herself to be a God. She grants him one wish in exchange for forcibly transporting him to another world.

And so the protagonist makes a wish.

The protagonist wishes to have the same ability as the strongest character in the anime world.>
